snippet: An open-air space in the Bowery Market food court may offer some of the best sushi made in the equivalent of a tollbooth. But don’t expect to linger....
abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews restaurant Sushi on Jones in NoHo section of Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: An open-air space in the Bowery Market food court may offer some of the best sushi made in the equivalent of a tollbooth. But don’t expect to linger.

headline.print_headline: This Sushi Waits for No One
headline.main: Omakase, on a Deadline, at Sushi on Jones
